name: NOKK
description: NOKK enables residents to provide hyper-local discovery. Let your visitors easily discover and connect with you on location. User your smartphone to connect with people, places and services all while keeping your details private.

team.name: Tom Flemming
team.bioHtml: Innovation, Experience Strategy, Product & Service Design, UX Architect, IA, Research, Business Analysis, Startup Genome. Founder @Escape Hatch

jobs.title: Software Engineer | Technical Co-founder
jobs.description:
You get excited about geolocation, building innovative services and creating a future oriented platform from the ground up. You know your way around iOS and have users needs and privacy in your mindset. You will be working with world-class innovation and design, taking the MVP to the next level and growing into technical co-founder. 

**What’s in it for you**
*  Become a founding member of this early stage startup.
*  Significant equity. 
*  Work on innovative approach, leading the way in location services. 
*  Become part of the team of smart, passionate people, excited to do whatever it takes to make a difference.
